name: Mylaensys
description:
Mylaensys provides consulting services for customers wanting to adopt Cloud Computing delivery skills in order to design, build and deploy infrastructure, platform and software as a service. Using the latest technology combined with creativity and knowledge, Mylaensys delivers highly innovative solutions focused on providing consumers with advanced technological alternatives regardless of the project scope or magnitude.
Mylaensys has over 15 years of cumulative experience in the information technology field and provides services focused on real customer needs.
